data.title: Vowel Push
data.statement:
<<The Problem:>>

Push the vowels (<<only vowels>>) in  the given string by 1 position to the right. 

-------------------------------------------------- xxx --------------------------------------------------

<<Note:>>

1. Vowels are the following characters: {{A}}, {{E}}, {{I}}, {{O}}, {{U}}
2. Vowel push is <<cyclic>> i.e. the <<last vowel>> gets pushed to the position of the <<first vowel>>

-------------------------------------------------- xxx --------------------------------------------------

<<Example:>>

Let string be: {{CODINGAME}}

So the vowels are at index: 
`{{O}} -> {{1}}
{{I}} -> {{3}}
{{A}} -> {{6}}
{{E}} -> {{8}}
`
On pushing, indexes become:
`{{O}} -> {{3}}
{{I}} -> {{6}}
{{A}} -> {{8}}
{{E}} -> {{1}}
`
âˆ´ Pushed string will be: {{CEDONGIMA}}

data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A string [[pushed]], the given string with vowels pushed

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The Problem:

Push the vowels (only vowels) in the given string by 1 position to the right.

-------------------------------------------------- xxx --------------------------------------------------

Note:

1. Vowels are the following characters: A, E, I, O, U
2. Vowel push is cyclic i.e. the last vowel gets pushed to the position of the first vowel

-------------------------------------------------- xxx --------------------------------------------------

Example:

Let string be: CODINGAME

So the vowels are at index: 
O -> 1
I -> 3
A -> 6
E -> 8

On pushing, indexes become:
O -> 3
I -> 6
A -> 8
E -> 1

∴ Pushed string will be: CEDONGIMA
Input
Line 1: A string line, the original line
Output
Line 1: A string pushed, the given string with vowels pushed
Constraints
line and pushed are in upper case
Example
Input
TO DO WITH VOWELS
Output
TE DO WOTH VIWOLS
